jp_text: タオル　弁当　上履き　歯ブラシ コップ　名前も書いた
google_translated: Towel Bento I wrote my toothbrush cup name

en_text: Futon?!
jp_text: 布団！？　は　赤ちゃん組か…

en_text: All right!
jp_text: よしっ！

en_text: Daikichi, hurry up!
jp_text: 大吉！　早く！！

en_text: Right now, I couldn't state \N"This isn't a sacrifice"
jp_text: 今　俺がこれは犠牲じゃないって言い切るのは嘘くせーから
google_translated: Now I'm not a sacrificing that I'm not a victim

en_text: But I hope I will be able to think \Nthat way some years from now.
jp_text: 何年か後にそう思えたらいいなと思う
google_translated: I think I should think so after several years

en_text: A sunny early Sunday afternoon
jp_text: {\be10}日曜の晴れた昼下がり

en_text: Let's go somewhere today
jp_text: {\be10}今日はどこへ行こう

en_text: But I can see it sparkling so bright
jp_text: {\be10}眩しく輝いて見える

en_text: With the sun shining down its warmth
jp_text: {\be10}高さが高い太陽と隣に君がいれば
google_translated: If you are there next to the sun with a high height

en_text: I'm already high, high, high
jp_text: {\be10}もう　HIGH　HIGH　HIGH

en_text: Sing, la, la, la
jp_text: {\be10}歌え LIVE　LIVE　LIVE

en_text: Ride the dancing wind
jp_text: {\be10}舞い上がる風に乗り

en_text: My voice springs up
jp_text: {\be10}声も飛び跳ねる

en_text: Rin, you have that same thing on \Nyour hand towel and lunch box...
jp_text: りん　お手拭き用のタオルも弁当箱と同じの…
google_translated: Towels for Rin Wiping are the same as the lunch box ...

en_text: What is it?
jp_text: 何だっけ？ 耳のでかい犬みたいなやつ

en_text: It's Lop Ear!
jp_text: 犬　違う！　ロップイヤーなの！

en_text: Lop...? What's that?
jp_text: ロップ…　何？

en_text: A rabbit!
jp_text: ウサギ！

en_text: This isn't a little dog?
jp_text: えーっ！？ これぶち犬じゃねえの？

en_text: Rin, let's go pee.
jp_text: りん　おしっこ行っとこ

en_text: I already went!
jp_text: もう行ったもん！
